snippet.title: Shiren the Wanderer 3 PSP HD Gameplay
snippet.description: As Shiren, a wandering adventurer with a penchant for exploration, monster-slaying, and item collection, you will trek across a beautiful and varied countryside with your companion, Koppa, a talking ferret. The RPG adventure Shiren the Wanderer features randomly-generated areas, intense boss battles, extensive item customization, and a cast of intriguing and unpredictable characters.
